snippet.title: Nimian Legends : Vandgels Trailer - Open World Adventure for Android, iPhone and iPad
snippet.description:
The sequel to Nimian Legends : BrightRidge is available now: 
ANDROID: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.protopop.vandgels&hl=en_CA
IOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/nimian-legends-vandgels/id1234134376
I’m a solo dev and any likes, subscriptions or shares support me:) The more people who know about my games, the more games I can make. As always, no micro transactions, hidden fees or surprises. I’m just someone who loves creating and sharing worlds. The trailer uses game footage from iPad Pro 2017, and was a created and edited in LumaFusion for iPad.

Official Website: http://nimianlegends.com

Nimian Legends: BrightRidge:
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/nimian-legends-brightridge-hd/id1021026309
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.protopop.brightridge

Nimian Legends: Vandgels:
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/nimian-legends-vandgels/id1234134376
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.protopop.vandgels

Wilderless:
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/wilderless/id1485263737
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Protopop.Wilderless

Please follow me - I can use the support:)
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/protopopgames/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/protopop
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/protopopgames

#openworld #fantasy #nature #wilderness #game #ipad #iphone #android
